name: Coffee Toss
description:
This is our second family game jam.  It was a major challenge getting this put together in time!

CREDITS

Programming was done by C. Haine in Scratch v3.

Artwork was drawn by K. Haine using Krita.

Music was composed by P. Haine using Garage Band.

Sound effects were a mix of recorded, plus some samples from kenney.nl and freesound.org,  They were edited using Audacity.
